mapper.update: update menu set name=#{name}, classification_id=#{classification.id}, price=#{price}, sales_volume=#{salesVolume}, discount=#{discount}, discount_price=#{discountPrice}, introduction=#{introduction}, sort=#{sort} where id=#{id};
mapper.insert: insert into table_reserve_home (customer_id, reservations_name, reservations_sex, reservations_tel, reservations_num, reservations_start_time, reserve_time, remarks) values(#{customer.id},#{reservationsName}, #{reservationsSex},#{reservationsTel},#{reservationsNum},#{reservationsStartTime}, NOW(),#{remarks});
mapper.select: SELECT table_reserve_home.id, reservations_name, reservations_sex, reservations_tel, reservations_num, reservations_start_time, reserve_time, remarks, specifications, choose_price, menu_count, table_num, menu.id AS menu_id,menu.name AS menu_name,large_price,medium_price,small_price,discount,discount_price FROM table_reserve_home_menu LEFT JOIN table_reserve_home ON table_reserve_home.id=table_reserve_home_menu.reserve_id LEFT JOIN menu ON menu.id=table_reserve_home_menu.menu_id WHERE table_reserve_home.id=#{id}

SELECT table_reserve_home.id, reservations_name, reservations_sex, reservations_tel, reservations_num, reservations_start_time, reserve_time, remarks, table_num, specifications, menu_image.url, choose_price, menu_count, menu.id AS menu_id,menu.name AS menu_name,large_price,medium_price,small_price,discount,discount_price, menu_image.url FROM table_reserve_home_menu LEFT JOIN table_reserve_home ON table_reserve_home.id=table_reserve_home_menu.reserve_id LEFT JOIN menu ON menu.id=table_reserve_home_menu.menu_id LEFT JOIN menu_image ON menu.id=menu_image.menu_id WHERE table_reserve_home.customer_id=#{customerId}
